meanings.definition: A flat piece of metal or other material on which a machine rests.
meanings.sent1: The bedplates of the engine were sturdy and kept it in place.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic carefully inspected the bedplates before installing the new equipment.
meanings.sent3: The bedplates decided to take a nap after a long day of supporting heavy machinery.
meanings.sent4: The bedplates of the factory were the backbone of its operations.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bedplates gleamed under the bright lights of the workshop.

meanings.definition: A plate or frame supporting a structure or machine.
meanings.sent1: The bedplates of the bridge were crucial for its stability.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers reinforced the bedplates to bear the weight of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The bedplates threw a surprise party for the machines they supported.
meanings.sent4: The bedplates of the building held everything together like a strong hug.
meanings.sent5: The bedplates stood strong against the test of time, never faltering in their support.
